message: This is a solid album, with elements reminiscent 2005's Digital Ash and 2007's Cassadaga, but I'd have preferred to hear more Four Winds and Wide Awake. Standouts include the opener Firewall, and Haile Selassie, a nice departure from much of Bright Eyes' past fare. The album's first single, Shell Games, is a great listen but doesn't have a lot of staying power. The album is streaming in its entirety on the band's YouTube: http://youtu.be/yVyxRNc_gTs
